# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

```javascript
var p = path.posix.join( 'foo', 'bar' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="notes">

</section>

<!-- /.notes -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
setTimeout( onTimeout, 0 );

function onTimeout() {
	console.log( 'the plugin supports examples which print to stdout (async)' );
	console.error( 'the plugin supports examples which print to stderr (async)' );
}
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
